SceneDescription.name: Endgame
SceneDescription.description:
Assassin: "New business venture?"
Lord Borkus: "Yes. I’m starting a line of furniture for rich people like myself. High class in every way."
Assassin: "Uh-huh..."
Lord Borkus: "I wouldn’t expect you to understand. Either way, I’m very pleased with how this day has gone. It seems my scolding of the maids made them see right. I must say though, things are far cleaner than they ever have been. Perhaps I’ll have to give them a raise."
